name: Xiahou Dun

ski.name: VICIOUS SPIN
desc: Xiahou Dun leaps to a target area wielding his double-edged spear dealing area damage and slowing enemy movement based on target's stacks of Evil Eye.
data: Slowdown: 30% for 1s. 1 second of slowdown is increased with a stack of Evil Eye.
study: Area of effect damage and slows movement

ski.name: HATEFUL EYE
desc: Plants a magic eye at a target location, adding 1 stack of Evil Eye to nearby enemy heroes every 2 seconds. Each ability cast within range of the eye reflects damage on the caster and adds 1 stack of Evil Eye. Passive: Evil Eye: Enemies gain 1 stack of Evil Eye each time damage is dealt to Xiahou Dun. Xiahou Dun deals more damage to heroes with an Evil Eye, up to 5 stacks. Lasts 5 seconds.
study: Places an evil eye that can reflect damage

ski.name: AMBUSH ASSAULT
desc: Xiahou Dun lights up the targetâ€™s field of vision for 5 seconds. Re-cast skill to begin charge up; charging time increases with distance. Xiahou Dun leaps up after charging to ambush a target area, dealing area damage and stun enemies for 1.5s. Casting is automatically canceled with 50% cooldown refunded if charge up exceeds 5 seconds.
study: Ambushes enemies, dealing damage and causing Fear
update: Damage â†‘ Fear â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: ZEN FURY
desc: Xiahou Dun begins to charge up, reducing movement speed by 20% but gaining armor, spell resistance and immunity to CC over 5 seconds before releasing a powerful roar, dealing damage and Taunting enemies within range. Damage dealt, Taunt duration and and radius all depend on charge up time. Abilities may be cast during charge up.
data: Minimum Physical Damage: 80/100/120/140, Maximum Physical Damage: 160/200/240/280

story: Heroes thronged to the Three Kingdoms, some disappearing into obscurity while others etched their names in the annals of history with their bravery. That's our man: the one-eyed General Xiahou Dun. Tough as nails and fiercely brave, this hero is destined for glory on the battlefield; and this vengeance is also destined to finish on the battlefield...
